name: dashboard
description: The embedded dashboard for Nakama server.

scripts.start: mkdir -p dist; cp ./node_modules/blaze/dist/blaze.min.css dist/; bundle src/index.js --output dist/app.js --watch
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist; cp ./node_modules/blaze/dist/blaze.min.css dist/; bundle src/index.js --output dist/app.js

author: Heroic Labs <team@heroiclabs.com>
